name: MediDuel
description:
This is a simple game where 2 players fight to death in 1vs1 medieval-themed duels. Different weapons and armours have different properties, so choose wisely. In the end, plate armour is propably OP, as it is in real life ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Game supports playing in LAN and gamepads.

Controls:

Player 1/2:

WSAD/Arrows - walk

K/3 (number pad) - attack

J/2 - block (if you have a shield)

H/1 - dodge

U/5 - parry (with shield)
